state: The dinner is almost ready! It's only missing a grilled half of a bag of chips. -= Bedroom =- You've just sauntered into a bedroom. You lean against the wall, inadvertently pressing a secret button. The wall opens up to reveal a chest drawer. You scan the room, seeing an antique trunk. You smell an interesting smell, and follow it to a king-size bed. But the thing is empty. There is a closed wooden door leading east. > -= Bedroom =-0/1
You open the antique trunk, revealing an old key. > -= Bedroom =-0/2
admissible_commands: take old key from antique trunk
optimal_action: take old key from antique trunk

state: You take the old key from the antique trunk. > -= Bedroom =-0/3
admissible_commands: insert old key into antique trunk
put old key on king-size bed
unlock wooden door with old key
optimal_action: unlock wooden door with old key

admissible_commands: insert old key into antique trunk
lock wooden door with old key
put old key on king-size bed
insert old key into antique trunk
put old key on king-size bed

state: -= Kitchen =- Look around you. Take it all in. It's not every day someone gets to be in a kitchen. You can see a refrigerator. What a great pairing of adjectives and nouns! You see a counter. Now why would someone leave that there? Unfortunately, there isn't a thing on it. You can see a stove. But the thing is empty, unfortunately. You scan the room for a kitchen island, and you find a kitchen island. The kitchen island is normal. On the kitchen island you can see a note. You shudder, but continue examining the room. There is a closed screen door leading east. There is an open wooden door leading west. There is an exit to the north. Don't worry, it is unguarded. There is an unblocked exit to the south. Your score has just gone up by one point. > -= Kitchen =-1/6
admissible_commands: put old key on kitchen island

state: -= Living Room =- You are in a living room. A standard one. You make out a couch. You see a half of a bag of chips on the couch. Oh, great. Here's a low table. The low table is typical. On the low table you can see a remote. You can make out a tv. Why don't you take a picture of it, it'll last longer! Unfortunately, there isn't a thing on it. You move on, clearly furious with TextWorld. There is an unblocked exit to the north. > -= Living Room =-1/7
admissible_commands: examine half of a bag of chips
put old key on low table
take half of a bag of chips from couch
optimal_action: take half of a bag of chips from couch

state: You take the half of a bag of chips from the couch. Your score has just gone up by one point. > -= Living Room =-2/8
admissible_commands: drop half of a bag of chips
eat half of a bag of chips
examine half of a bag of chips
put half of a bag of chips on couch
put half of a bag of chips on low table
put half of a bag of chips on tv
put old key on low table
